titleStmt.title: A letter sent from a gentleman of Beverley, to one Mr. Holby gent of London concerning the entertainment of my Lord of Holland by the King, at His Majesties Court at Beverley, the fifteenth day of this present July, 1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho: Banks and William Lee,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
